skill.name: kpi-dashboard-design
skill.description: Design effective KPI dashboards with metrics selection, visualization best practices, and real-time monitoring patterns. Use when building business dashboards, selecting metrics, or designing data visualization layouts.
skill.summary: Design effective KPI dashboards with metrics selection, visualization best practices, and real-time ...
skill.author: wshobson

security_audit.summary: The skill is a static markdown guide with example SQL and Python snippets. It does not execute code, access files, environment variables, or make network calls. External links are informational only.

content.user_title: Design KPI dashboards that drive decisions
content.value_statement: Many dashboards overwhelm teams with unclear metrics. This skill guides KPI selection and layout patterns that focus attention and action.
actual_capabilities: Explain strategic, tactical, and operational KPI levels with cadence
Provide KPI lists for sales, marketing, product, and finance
Show dashboard layout patterns with ASCII wireframes
Include SQL examples for MRR, retention, and CAC
Provide a Streamlit dashboard code example
List KPI dashboard do and do not practices
limitations: No live data connections or API calls
No automated alerting or monitoring configuration
Examples require adaptation to your schema and tools
No deployment, hosting, or BI tool setup steps

use_cases.title: Define executive KPI view
use_cases.description: Create a one page summary with headline KPIs, trends, and alerts for monthly reviews.

use_cases.title: Standardize KPI governance
use_cases.description: Align SMART definitions and update cadence across departments.

use_cases.title: Design real time monitoring
use_cases.description: Plan an operations dashboard with system health, throughput, and alert panels.

prompt_templates.title: Starter KPI list
prompt_templates.prompt: List 6 core KPIs for a SaaS executive dashboard and explain why each matters.

prompt_templates.title: Department splits
prompt_templates.prompt: Create KPI sets for sales and marketing with update frequency and intended audience.

prompt_templates.title: Layout critique
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this dashboard outline and propose a clearer hierarchy with alert placement.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced retention
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a cohort retention section with suggested visuals and questions to answer.

output_examples.input: Outline an executive KPI dashboard for a subscription business.
output: Headline KPIs: MRR, ARR, churn rate, NPS, active customers
Layout: KPI cards on top, trend line, product mix chart, alerts strip
Cadence: monthly executive review with weekly drilldowns

best_practices: Limit KPI count and keep them aligned to business goals
Show trends and targets for context
Match update frequency to decision cadence
anti_patterns: Overcrowding the dashboard with too many charts

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The guidance is prompt based and works in Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides guidance and examples only, not live data connections or deployed dashboards.

faq.question: Can I use this with my BI tool?
faq.answer: Yes. Apply the KPI lists and layout patterns in any BI tool or custom app.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No. It is static guidance and does not read or transmit data.

faq.question: What if the KPIs do not fit my business?
faq.answer: Adapt the framework and SMART criteria to your goals and data.

faq.question: How is this different from a dashboard template?
faq.answer: It explains strategy and patterns instead of a fixed layout.
